body: Prequel? I don't understand noodles language,, I also bad at english... But mate,, good artwork~

From what I can gather, this is kinda where the myth/legend and the truth of the Orcs in this series blends. The story we got from this installment is probably a partial truth, wherein such savage Orcs did exist at one point or another, but because of the long-lived nature of Elves, only they have any memories of Orcs being such savages, where their "present day" cousins are just your average farmers. That or their race also has multiple cultures and Mr. Orc is from a different culture of Orcs. Whatever, it's a fuckin' hentai.
Na this is definitely an origin story about the mom of the previous orc who loves orc sex....

This is probably a "If you are a bad kid, the boogie man will come and take you away" kind of story the Mother was telling them when they was a try. Probably the cause of the Little Sister's distrust for Orc in the Sequel
